column2: My realm was not connected to my liege's de jure lands. With [From.GetHerHis] death, I have an opportunity to become independent.
Non-de-jure territory must be connected by land in order to remain part of the realm after the ruler dies.
Territory can be connected through one sea zone.
Territory can be connected through up to two sea zones.
All coastal provinces are considered connected to each other. Only inland exclaves are at risk of breaking off.
